scripts.docker:dev: docker run -it --rm -v .:/app -v ./node_modules:/app/node_modules -p 127.0.0.1:3000:3000 next14-docker-starter npm run dev
scripts.docker:build: docker run -it -v .:/app -v ./node_modules:/app/node_modules next14-docker-starter npm run build
scripts.docker:start: docker run -it -v .:/app -v ./node_modules:/app/node_modules -p 127.0.0.1:3000:3000 next14-docker-starter npm run start
